rounds.response:
[game analysis]  
Sitting with the absolute nuts pre-flop (A♣A♦) 100BBs deep. There’s 30 in the pot and I’m currently the big blind having already put in 10. P1 is the small blind and they’ve made it 20 to go, so it’s 10 more to me. Standard textbook play here is to build the pot while protecting equity by 3-betting big. I’ll size it to 3× their raise ⇒ 60 total (i.e., raise by an additional 40 on top of their 20).

[decision]  
[Raise 60]
